name: Dotndot
tag_list: advertising, seo, online-marketing, designing, web-development, web-designing
overview:
Dotndot.Com is full-service strategic design firm specializing in creative designing. We focus on creativity executing the specific communication objectives of our clients. Our extensive experience helping companies of various size and markets with branding, packaging, identity, promotion, and communication issues enables dotNdot.Com to help implement single projects or entire campaigns with equal ability. Whether communicating B2B or B2C we believe strategic design creates oppurtunities, deliver return on investment, and has the ability to take your business, brand or organization to new levels of success.

Internet Marketing : http://www.toputop.com

Services:

  • Website Designing
  • Portal Development
  • Search Engine Optimization
  • Branding
  • Advertising
  • Graphic Designing
  • Animations
  • Video Ads
  • Online Marketing
